intro: Palicourea spiralis, commonly known as spiral leaf palicourea, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Its small, tubular flowers are typically white or pale yellow, and it produces small, dark berries.
